dialogues.speaker: Narrator
dialogues.text: Welcome to Eldoria, a mystical realm of wonder and magic.

dialogues.speaker: Eryndor Thorne
dialogues.text: I'VE been traveling these woods for hours. I hope I'm close to finding the ancient ruins.

dialogues.speaker: Lila Moonwhisper
dialogues.text: Ah, a traveler! We don't often get strangers here. What brings you to our neck of the woods?
